hotels.title: Central Broome Oaks Escape Just Moments from Cable Beach
hotels.description: Soak up the unique beauty of Western Australia with a stay at Oaks Broome Hotel, your gateway to the stunning Kimberley region. Surrounded by lush landscaped gardens and just one street from Roebuck Bay, this collection of stylish hotel rooms and self-contained apartments, complete with serene pool views and modern amenities, are just a short walk from Broome's collection of laidback cafés, bars and restaurants. Remote yet utterly alluring, Broome’s beauty is undeniable. Sitting on the edge of the Kimberley, where the turquoise waters and beautiful white sands of the famous Cable Beach meet the sunset, this is a region that is unparalleled for its natural splendour. Take it all in at your own pace from Oaks Broome Hotel.

hotels.title: Award-Winning Broome Apartment Escape near Cable Beach
hotels.description: Just steps from the white powdery sands of Cable Beach and the glistening Indian Ocean is Seashells Broome, a self-contained apartment resort in an unbeatable location near Broome’s most iconic sites. A Silver winner for Deluxe Accommodation at the 2021 Perth Airport WA Tourism Awards, this self-contained resort knows how to deliver award-winning comfort. Unwind in self-contained one and two-bedroom apartments, or an epic three-bedroom bungalow, and enjoy two refreshing swimming pools (including a kids' paddling pool), a children’s playground, lush resort gardens and BBQ facilities. Broome is beautiful from every angle and you’re perfectly placed to make the most of its adventurous activities and wildlife when you stay at Seashells Broome. Discover camels crossing Cable Beach against a sunset backdrop, dip your toes into the turquoise Indian Ocean, stroll across pearl-white beaches set against red cliffs and go seasonal whale watching between July and September. If you can tear yourself away from the resort’s pools for a day, make sure to see the Horizontal Falls, described by Sir David Attenborough as ‘Australia’s most unusual natural wonder’.
